We were there for only a short time but thought that our hotel stay was the ABSOLUTE highlight of our trip to Rome. Thank you again to Louisa and Daniel for going above and beyond to make our trip PERFECT in every way!!! Can't wait to go back and will tell everyone that is planning a trip to Rome to stay at the Palm Gallery. Liva Rivera

Reviews.Title: “Home from home”
Reviews.Author: frinney
Reviews.Content: From the second we arrived, we were made exceptionally welcome by Luisa and her staff. Loved the room, it's decor and the peaceful setting. Luisa could not be more accommodating and is fabulously interesting company. Whilst many of the sights were a good 2km away, the hotel offers a wonderful spot to chill with throbbing feet and some helpful Prosecco. I believe that Luisa's love for her property and for looking after people will ensure that the experience is a difficult one to match elsewhere. Thoroughly recommend a stay here and am very keen to return.

Reviews.Title: “Met all our expectations and more”
Reviews.Author: Aragorn
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel after reading the glowing reviews that it had received and my correspondence with the hotel owner seemed to indicate that she truly welcomed children. I have to admit that I was a bit worried initially since it seemed a bit away from the main tourist attractions and and also whether it would live up to what it was made out to be. We stayed there for 5 nights and I can now confidently say that Luisa, Daniel and the rest of the staff made our stay in Rome a truly memorable experience! Luisa, her husband whom we met briefly and Daniel made us and our children so welcomed that at the end of our trip, our children especially were reluctant to leave. The room was as described on the website, cosy and sun drenched with L'Occitance toiletries and towels for the children that were beautifully embroidered with dinosaurs, helicopters etc. Breakfast was lovely with fresh pastries and juices and good coffee and after a long day of sightseeing, this place was cosy and welcoming. We loved the 'extended family' of the dog, cats and turtles and our boys felt really at home. Luisa and Daniel also provided us with maps and tips on how we could get to the sights and the location in a beautiful quiet neighbourhood meant that we were away from the hustle and bustle of the city and yet never being too far away. There are a couple of lovely restuarants nearby and one is within a park (Limmonaia if I spelt that right) and there is a good supermarket as well where we could stock up on water, snacks etc. The only downside if any is that the metro station is about 1 km away and with two young boys, it did get tiring for their little feet at the end of a long day but apart from that the bus stops were very close by. If we ever visit Rome again, I know that we would not consider staying anywhere else but here.

Reviews.Title: “This was one of the best hotel experiences EVER!!!”
Reviews.Author: andyweller1111
Reviews.Content: This was hands down one of the best hotel experiences we've ever had! This was our honeymoon and first time in Rome, so we didn't know what to expect. The Palm Gallery Hotel exceeded all of our expectations. The Metro station was just a short walk from the hotel, which made all of our sight-seeing extremely convenient. .The building is a beautifully converted Villa with charming gardens and outdoor eating nooks. The rooms were the largest, most stylish and most comfortable of all of the hotels that we stayed in on our honeymoon. The included breakfasts were great. The best part about staying here however was the Staff. Luisa, Jean-Carlo and Daniel are wonderful!!! They made sure that we and all of the other visitors at the hotel had everything we needed at all times of the day. Not only were they always available, but they were extremely helpful in giving us great travel directions and advice on local restaurants and shops. My wife and I consider ourselves extremely lucky to have have met them and greatly look forward to going back to the Palm Gallery for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: “One of the highlights of our Italian vacation”
Reviews.Author: ualift
Reviews.Content: We were guided to the Palm Gallery by the outstanding reviews and were not dissappointed. Great staff from owner/hostess Luisa and her husband along with Daniel and his coworkers. No limit to the local assistance provided with directions, local knowledge. Our Liberty room was beautiful, large and immaculate daily. Luisa's nature treats you like family. Wish we could have stayed longer. Hope to return when the cafe opens next year.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful experience”
Reviews.Author: Ivkovich
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights with my wife, mom and two daughters. I have never had such tremendous service at a hotel, inn, bed and breakfast anywhere in the world. Ever. Do I exagerate? Read on. Louisa is the lady in charge and from the moment you arrive until the moment you leave, she makes sure have everything you need. Rooms are comfortable, pleasant, breakfast is fresh and delicious (high quality everything). The location required a cab for us (Louisa called for us and made sure it held five people) but most others could walk to Spanish steps. She gave great directions and travel advice and went out of her way to help in every possible manner. The hotel is in a charming old neighborhood with a lovely garden and patio. Newly opened, this is her first venture into running a hotel and based on our experience, she found her calling. It is kind of a work in progress-the hotel is finished, but she is working on converting a ground floor area into a cafe and wine bar. Health and spa area almost finished. I am sure thye will be fantastic when she gets completed. Be sure to visit with her dog, cats, turtles during your stay. They are all part of the family. Now get this-I hesitate to mention because all you people will expect the same treatment. Louisa drove us to the rental car place at the train station and went in with me to make sure we were taken care of. We would have been hosed without her since they didn't have the car we reserved and we needed a larger van to fit all the people and luggage. She helped negotiate for a larger vehicle at the same rate with the guy in Italian. She then drove back with us to the hotel to make sure we didn't get lost and had one of her guys drive back her car Anyway, you get the idea. Stay here for vacation or business trip, you will be greatly rewarded. Just take some time to talk to her over a glass of wine. A wonderful person who runs a great little quiet, pleasant, relaxing hotel. A slice of heaven in Rome!

Reviews.Title: “Best Deal in Rome”
Reviews.Author: GinaMarie63
Reviews.Content: This is a great place. We were booked for 3 nights and stayed there for 10. The rooms are spotless and the bedding is very comfortable. The owner Luisa, her husband and staff are great people. She made everyone feel welcome and the guests were able to mingle on the terrace and have a great time. Nights at the hotel sharing wine and eating pasta with our hosts and other guests made the trip that much more memorable. The neighborhood is great and close to the bus line or you can walk into dowm. The bus ride to Termi Station, Spanish Steps Trevi Fountain, etc is no more than 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “So much more than I could have imagined!”
Reviews.Author: LNarbo17
Reviews.Content: My three girlfriends and I stayed at the Palm Gallery Hotel in mid May and had the most lovely hotel experience ever. My friend had been emailing with the owner, Luisa, who was so kind and loves students like us. Although she happened to not be at the hotel when we stayed, her staff and husband took care of us like we were their family! My friends and I had never been to Rome, and it's a big city!, but the staff at Palm Gallery made us feel so at home. This place is just like a home. All the rooms are decorated with a different motif, the beds so comfortable and the bathrooms gorgeous! In a beautifully renovated house in a well off, residential area in Rome this hotel is away from the tourist attractions, but a five minute drive to the train station. (Tourist buses leave from the train station if you're interested in those.) It's easy to catch the bus into the center of the city. If you don't mind staying a (free, people don't pay) bus/12 euro cab ride away from the city, it is the place to stay! My girlfriends and I had a truly Roman experience at the Palm Gallery. Cappuccinos, bread, cheese and a relaxed continental breakfast in the morning, wine available for 10euro by the evening and the home's garden, deck, cats and dog to make you feel comfortable and right at home! Send an email in if you want to know more, but I recommend this place wholeheartedly!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay with Outstanding service”
Reviews.Author: OriChen
Reviews.Content: Hi Everyone, I just landed from a 5 nights stay with my girlfriend at the Palm Gallery Hotel which I found on this website, I am more then happy to recommend this hotel and let me tell you why: First Lusia and her husband for the great care and service , caring and kindness which is hard to find these days (took us to the train station when we got stuck with a missing bus - tnx !) Great atmosphere when on the porch having breakfast or on one of the benches in the garden. The location it just outside the city center in a calm and relaxed neighborhood , 10min walk from villa borghese or a few bus stops from the center. We would defintly go back Ori and Gali

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel - Comfortable and spacious rooms, with kind and caring staff.”
Reviews.Author: 423JC
Reviews.Content: My brother and I stayed at Palm Gallery for six nights. Our room was perfect - spacious with two very comfortable beds and a large shower. Room was nicely decorated, clean, had a flat screen TV, and relaxing atmosphere. The staff was excellent; providing outstanding service and assistance whenever asked. After a long day of walking to see the sights of Rome, it was great to return to our hotel room for a quiet night. We would highly recommend Palm Gallery to family and friends when visiting Rome.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Experience”
Reviews.Author: AntoBianca
Reviews.Content: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Palm Gallery Hotel. Beautifully presented, clean and spacious rooms and great position, very close to the centre. I would go back tomorrow given the chance. The owners were very kind and hospitable. I would reccomend this hotel to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel Ever”
Reviews.Author: emz911
Reviews.Content: This is the best hotel by far from our trip to Italy--in fact probably from any trip I've ever taken. The rooms are spacious and beautiful. The linens are so luxurious. But the best thing about the place is the hospitality. Luisa, the owner, is the most warm and welcoming person. She was born to own a hotel. Everyday when we returned to the hotel, she would welcome us in to sit and talk with her. The evenings we spent chatting with her and listening to her tell stories was by far the highlight of my trip. I can't wait to go back just to hang out with her again.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel, host, hospitality... everything you can ask for... and MORE!”
Reviews.Author: Boring_ASim
Reviews.Content: It was the 1st time I've been in Italy, let alone Rome and I was pretty wary. Well, I rarely traveled alone and will tend to be more careful. however, the hospitality that Luisa provided was out-of-the-world. Firstly, I was not prepared for how comfortable and incredibly beautiful the room was. The beds were so soft that I fell asleep like a baby immediately. As the place has been newly furnished, all amenities, including the washroom, shower and others are new. The toilet is clean and sparkles from the pride of good housekeeping. There is an iron if you need one, with a fully-stocked mini-fridge, all right in your room! Secondly, the place is serene. It is a residential area and the peace is reflected in the quietness of the place, which is perfect for a good night's sleep. Thirdly, it was in the day that I appreciated how beautiful the whole place was. clean gardening and floral arrangement seeks a certain quaint atmosphere, perfect if you're on a holiday. Did I also mention the rooftop area where you can sit and enjoy the moonlit night, with the wind from the sea (as our hostess explained to us!) Lastly, i would like to highlight the benefits of our wonderful host. She is pretty, perky, humorous, cares for your well-being and makes sure you're all set for everything! We got maps from her, home-cooked food which was AMAZING! Drinking is favored upon especially if you have an engaging topic! She is everything a Mom is but WAY cooler. Trust me, I had the best leg of my Italian trip here. I will return! And with all the love to Luisa, See you soon! Aaron

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous boutique hotel!”
Reviews.Author: DidaNYC
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed everything from the atmosphere to the rooms and mostly the great people and service and the hotel. A GREAT place to stay in Rome and enjoy the great Italian atmosphere. Warmly recommend it to everyone that likes, great people, great rooms and friendly faces.

Reviews.Title: “Highlight of my trip”
Reviews.Author: coirgirl
Reviews.Content: The Palm Gallery was one of the highlights of my trip, I wish I could have stayed there for the whole trip! My room was large and beautiful with wonderful, luxurious linens. The owner, Luisa, was fabulous and took great care of us. I would definitely stay there again.
